name: Crystal Kingdom Dizzy 2017
overview: The 2017 ZX Spectrum game, Crystal Kingdom Dizzy is a stunning remake of the 1992 original, featuring updated graphics running in a 50fps engine, six new 128K tunes and a superb loading screen. * Programmed by Evgeniy Barskiy * In-game graphics by Dmitri Ponomarjov * GUI design & menu pictures by Oleg Origin * Music covered by Sergey Kosov * Title picture by Marco Antonio del Campo The magical crystal treasure has been stolen and scattered all over the islands, so it is up to Dizzy to find them and restore order. Once again, Dizzy's main enemy is the pirates, and some deadly island creatures, but all Dizzy's friends are around to help out when the going gets tough.
